title: Pot, ca. 1950
dimensions:
H x diam.: 9.4 x 11.1 cm (3 11/16 x 4 3/8 in.)
diam. (at lip): 7.9 cm (3 1/8 in.)
description: The globular body of the pot rests upon a flat base.  The swelling sides have a slightly angled shoulder; the body tapers toward a circular mouth.  The exterior is painted in a traditional line pattern of a repeating series of interlocking contninous lines arranged in contiguous triangles. The underside is signed, in brown, "Lucy M. Lewis Acoma, N.M."

tombstone.epitaph:
Pot, ca. 1950.
ca. 1950. earthenware. Gift of Mrs. Homer Kripke. 1980-21-6.
